block.p: Manhattan
FINANCIAL DISTRICT

$625,000 120 Greenwich Street (Carlisle Street) (Greenwich Place) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 570-sq.-ft. condo in a recently renovated prewar loft building; concierge; dining area, 10 1/2-ft. ceilings, central air-conditioning, south and west exposures; common roof deck in building; common charge $571; 100% tax abated; listed at $635,000, 30 weeks on market (broker: Citi Habitats New York)
GREENWICH VILLAGE

$795,000 70 East 10th Street (Stewart House) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; dining area, windowed kitchen, central air-conditioning, south and west exposures; gym and laundry in building; maintenance $1,026, 51% tax deductible; listed at $795,000, 1 week on market (broker: Beth Chase Real Estate)

UPPER EAST SIDE $2 million 2 East End Avenue (79th Street) 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; renovated eat-in kitchen and baths, high ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 exposures; laundry and health club in building; maintenance $2,929, 60% tax deductible; listed at $2.195 million, 6 weeks on market (brokers: Brown Harris Stevens; Halstead Property)
MURRAY HILL

$385,000 10 Park Avenue (34th Street) 500-sq.-ft. studio co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; common roof deck and laundry; maintenance $636, 55% tax deductible; listed at $385,000, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Bellmarc Realty; Prudential Douglas Elliman)
CHELSEA

$483,000 148 West 23rd Street (Chelsea Mews) 615-sq.-ft. studio co-op in a renovated prewar building; 24-hr. doormen; 11 1/2-ft. ceilings, south exposure; maintenance $977, 60% tax deductible; listed at $499,000, 9 weeks on market (brokers: Halstead Property; Manhattan Apartments)
Bronx
WILLIAMSBRIDGE

$540,000 773 Adee Avenue 3-family, 77-year-old 2-story brick- and vinyl-sided house; 2 bedrooms, enclosed porch, finished basement in primary unit; 1 bedroom in others; 37-by-91-ft. lot; taxes $3,700; listed at $595,000, 16 weeks on market (broker: J. A. Villani Realty)
Brooklyn

BROOKLYN COLLEGE AREA $610,000 2787 Bedford Avenue 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 77-year-old attached brick-sided house; dining room, renovated kitchen and bath, living room with bay windows, semifinished basement; 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,386; listed at $649,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Mary Kay Gallagher)

BROOKLYN HEIGHTS $325,000 75 Henry Street 600-sq.-ft. alcove studio in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; maintenance $518, 65% tax deductible; listed at $345,000, 21 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)
PARK SLOPE

$890,000 306 Second Street (Cityview Gardens) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,339-sq.-ft. condo in a newly constructed building; dining area, eat-in kitchen; terrace; gym in building; common charge $240; taxes $864 (abated); listed at $899,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Aguayo & Huebener)
Queens

BAYSIDE $610,000 23-69 205th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 58-year-old detached Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement; screened porch; 45-by-96-ft. lot; taxes $2,744; listed at $625,888, 1 week on market (broker: ReMax Millennium)
Florida
TAMPA

$174,900 4504 La Capri Court (Tampa Villas South) 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,044-sq.-ft. town house condo in a 27-year-old building; eat-in kitchen; common charge $169; taxes $508; listed at $179,900, 9 weeks on market (brokers: Prudential Bob Hatton Realty; Century 21 Fisher & Associates)

TAMPA $280,000 3822 South Himes Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 55-year-old 1-story wood-frame house; renovated kitchen and baths, living room, sunroom, ceramic tile floors; 1-car garage; 0.15-acre lot; taxes $2,211; listed at $280,000, 12 weeks on market (brokers: Prudential Bob Hatton Realty; Keller Williams Realty)

TAMPA $304,900 20616 Great Laurel Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, newly constructed, 2-story stucco-sided house in a gated recreational community; eat-in kitchen with snack bar, family room; 2-car garage; 0.13-acre lot; taxes $2,285; listed at $340,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Bob Hatton Realty; Exit Extreme Realty)

TAMPA $2 million 3907 Bayshore Boulevard 4-bedroom, 5 1/2-bath, newly constructed 2-story stucco-sided Mediterranean-style house; 106-by-137-ft. lot overlooking Hillsborough Bay; taxes $14,012; listed at $3.1 million, 14 weeks on market (broker: Smith & Associates Real Estate)
APOLLO BEACH

$2.2 million 1004 Piano Lane 4-bedroom, 4-bath, newly constructed 2-story stucco-sided house in a gated recreational community; marble foyer, elevator, eat-in kitchen; balcony, in-ground pool, 3-car garage; 90-by-132-ft. lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $2.1 million, 17 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Beggins Enterprises)
